TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlace extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an entry in a custom place collection for [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default open and save dialog boxes on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] have an area on the left side of the dialog box titled **Favorite Links**. This area is called custom places. This class represents a custom place.
On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/add/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/add/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid knownFolderGuid) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a custom place identified by a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/add/includes/winsdk-md.md)].
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the FileDialogCustomPlace method. To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
[!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.windows.forms.f_7_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.windows.forms.f_7_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path) cil managed

Docs.param: A folder path to the custom place.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. with a specified folder path to a custom place.
Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID for the custom place.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder for the custom place. If the custom place was specified with a folder path, then an empty GUID is returned. For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/add/includes/winsdk-md.md)].

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the folder path to the custom place.
Docs.value: A folder path to the custom place. If the custom place was specified with a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID, then an empty string is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a string that represents this instance.
Docs.returns: A string that represents this instance.
